report_data.Post or Account Link: Forgiveness for traitors is betrayal itself. Every neighborhood that shelters them must be taught a harsh lesson. Weakness will cost us everything. We have to strike fear into their hearts. Only through fear can we protect the homeland.
report_data.Groq Classification:
I classify this post as:

Call for Violence**

This post promotes violence and revenge against specific groups (traitors) and their families, stating that every neighborhood that shelters them must be "taught a harsh lesson." This language implies collective punishment and promotes fear and violence as a means to protect the homeland. The phrase "strike fear into their hearts" is a clear call for violence and intimidation.

classification:
After analyzing the post, I classify it as:
